alert.note: Alert for Eastern Uinta Mountains; La Sal and Abajo Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 29 at 2:57PM MDT until March 30 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM MDT WEDNESDAY ABOVE 9000 FEET... * WHAT...Highest snow amounts above 9000 feet. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches with locally higher amounts in the Uintas. * WHERE...Eastern Uinta Mountains. * WHEN...Until 6 AM MDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Uinta Mountains; La Sal and Abajo Mountains
